title: FS or FT ~ Cobb (bat on) PSA 1.5***TRADED***
author: Louisville_Hugger

posts.post_title: FS or FT ~ Cobb (bat on) PSA 1.5***TRADED***
posts.post_content: Have a very nice PSA 1.5 Cobb bat on that I would like to trade for a similar condition bat off or red port., WaJo port., off back Cubbies (Chance, Brown, Tinker, Kling, Steinfeldt, Overall….etc.). Card is one of the nicest 1.5’s I’ve seen. Has a spot of tape residue on the back, and if it weren’t for that it would’ve graded much higher. PWCC “A” for those of you that that appeals to. If interested, please PM me and I’ll email or text pics. Also willing to sell outright for 3.1k.
Bump…..still looking for a trade (preferably) or to sell. Don’t mind trading down in value a little bit for a different Cobb. Will look at any off back HOFer. Thanks!!
